title: Autism Homeopathic Vaccine Detox | newleaf
description: Only the theraputics of natural homeopathic medicine has the capability of helping improve, or in many cases eliminating, the negative effects that may have developed after childhood vaccinations. This order includes two bottles which are made in different strentghs. This in no way can alter the immunity that may have been aquired from vaccination and is no way a replacement for childhoos vaccinations. But many time if any symptoms of autism developed within a 3 months period of vaccinaion, or there was any regression, this detox will usually help. It is natural, side effect free, and in most cases effective in improve symptoms.
